bug.author: Hoeze
bug.description:
Hi, I just found tf.matrix_solve_ls and read its documentation at <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/matrix_solve_ls>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/matrix_solve_ls</denchmark-link> : <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1200058/37315800-cbf13e16-265b-11e8-9ead-727fd6d95c7d.png></denchmark-link>
Seems like there are some markdown errors... Have I written custom code: No OS Platform and Distribution: N/A TensorFlow installed from: N/A TensorFlow version: N/A Bazel version: N/A CUDA/cuDNN version: N/A GPU model and memory: N/A Exact command to reproduce: N/A

comments.comment: Thank you for your post. We noticed you have not filled out the following field in the issue template. Could you update them if they are relevant in your case, or leave them as N/A? Thanks. Have I written custom code OS Platform and Distribution TensorFlow installed from TensorFlow version Bazel version CUDA/cuDNN version GPU model and memory Exact command to reproduce
Created a PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/18022>#18022</denchmark-link> to fix this math equation format issue
